Previous claims of ISIS presence at the: Mexico border have been found to be false, including claims of prayer rugs and ISIS fighters being caught at the border.
The conservative watchdog Judicial Watch: s report stating that ISIS was running a camp in Mexico just over the border from El Paso has been rated false.
Governor Abbott: s claim that Texas had seen three ISIS-related incidents has been rated mostly false, with his definition of "ISIS-related" being deemed extremely loose.
The expert: s inquiry to the Department of Homeland Security did not provide any evidence or confirmation of ISIS operatives crossing the border.
